data.apiNameCn: 国内按PNR变更费计算（订单）
data.introduce: 国内按PNR变更费计算(AirReIssuePriceOrder)为用户提供了查询国内自动退改签TRR退改签运价信息功能为一体的服务。
data.business: 国内按PNR变更费计算（订单）
data.functions: 国内按PNR变更费计算（订单）
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirReIssuePriceOrderRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航空出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"销售点信息：POS信息涉及到用户后台指定 的访问授权，用户所在的销售 地点，用户缺省使用的航空公 司等信息。","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"airlinecode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"换开航司：发起换开请求的换开航空公司代码：如果为航空公司网站（包括B2B/B2C/B2G），则由网站提供此航空公司代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"iatacode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"Iata号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"城市代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"PCC：代理人office号，如PEK099","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"ReIssueinfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"ReIssueinfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退改签明细","children":[{"name":"FlightSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"operationCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"实际承运航空公司两字码，例：CA","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司名称","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班号（例如：1831）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"departure","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"起飞机场三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码：机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航站楼","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"登机口","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"arrival","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"到达机场三字码","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航站楼","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"出站口","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@BaggageClaim","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"取行李处","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Diversion","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"equipment","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"机型","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"飞机型号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"marketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司名称","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"flightno","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"departureTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班起飞时间","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"arrivalTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"到达时间","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航段类型，使用常量 RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_ARNK RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_NORMAL RCReq_NewSegment.AIRSEG_OPEN","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"actionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"行动代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"仓位","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"预定信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"PNR和订单号：新预定PNR号，新预定的订单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"类型：固定值PNR、ORDER","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"TicketNumber_Before","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"旧票号 13位校验可带-","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PayType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"支付方式(支持CC/CASH)","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"IsInfant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否是婴儿","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"姓名","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"旅客编号如P1","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassCount","type":"int","quantity":"1","description":"旅客数量","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否是非自愿","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@SysType","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"系统类型:B,C","children":[],"default":"C"}],"default":""}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<OTA_AirReIssuePriceRQ>
	<POS>
		<Source>
			<airlinecode>CA</airlinecode>
			<iatacode>08385252</iatacode>
			<CityCode>BJS</CityCode>
			<PseudoCityCode>BJS191</PseudoCityCode>
		</Source>
	</POS>
	<ReIssueinfos>
		<ReIssueinfo>
			<FlightSegments>
				<!-- 新航段信息 -->
				<FlightSegment>
					<departure LocationCode="PEK" />
					<arrival LocationCode="SHA" />
					<equipment AirEquipType="359" />
					<marketingCarrier Code="CA" />
					<operationCarrier Code="CA" />
					<departureTime>2024-06-05 07:30</departureTime>
					<arrivalTime>2024-06-05 10:00</arrivalTime>
					<type>NORMAL</type>
					<flightno>CA1523</flightno>
					<cabin>Y</cabin>
					<actionCode>HK</actionCode>
				</FlightSegment>
			</FlightSegments>
			<!-- 原票号 -->
			<TicketNumber_Before>999-6923957445</TicketNumber_Before>
			<IsInfant>false</IsInfant>
			<PassName>mai/dou</PassName>
			<InvoluntaryIdentifier>false</InvoluntaryIdentifier>
			<!-- 新预定的PNR -->
			<BookingReferenceID ID="HGMD11" ID_Context="PNR"/>
			<BookingReferenceID ID="240511143521625cd59" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
		</ReIssueinfo>
	</ReIssueinfos>
</OTA_AirReIssuePriceRQ>
